item.title: 印度恢复进口委内瑞拉石油，信实集团寻求直接协议
item.description:
Indian refiners have resumed buying Venezuelan oil through intermediaries, with Reliance (RELI.NS) set to meet executives from state firm PDVSA next week to discuss oil sales following the easing of U.S. sanctions on the South American country, people familiar with the matter said.翻译:知情人士称，印度炼油商已恢复通过中间商购买委内瑞拉石油，信实公司(RELI.NS)将于下周与国营公司 PDVSA 的高管会面，讨论美国放松对这个南美国家制裁后的石油销售问题。

The resumption in trade between the OPEC producer and what it was its second largest destination for oil exports comes after Washington in October temporarily lifted sanctions banning Venezuelan oil exports, prompting a flurry of spot sales of crude and fuel through middlemen and traders, mostly to China.翻译:OPEC产油国与其第二大石油出口目的地之间的贸易恢复是在华盛顿于10月暂时解除禁止委内瑞拉石油出口的制裁之后，促使通过中间商和贸易商进行大量原油和燃料现货销售，其中大部分销往中国。

But Venezuela's oil output has been volatile, limiting what it can offer for exports.翻译:但委内瑞拉的石油产量一直不稳定，限制了其出口能力。

India last imported Venezuelan crude in 2020. Access to Venezuela's heavy oil could cap import costs for India, which has become a major Russian oil buyer, and further reduce its reliance on the Middle East.翻译:印度上次进口委内瑞拉原油是在2020年。获得委内瑞拉重油可能会限制印度的进口成本，并进一步减少其对中东的依赖。印度已成为俄罗斯石油的主要买家。

Three Indian refiners have bought some 4 million barrels of Venezuelan crude for February delivery at between $7.50 and $8 per barrel below dated Brent on a delivered ex-ship basis, five trade sources said.翻译:五位贸易消息人士称，三家印度炼油厂已购买约 400 万桶 2 月交割的委内瑞拉原油，价格按离船交货价格比布伦特原油价格低 7.5 至 8 美元/桶。

Of those, trading house Vitol sold 1.5 million barrels to Indian Oil Corp (IOC.NS) and 500,000 barrels to HPCL-Mittal Energy (HMEL), a joint venture between state-run Hindustan Petroleum Corp (HPCL.NS) and Mittal Energy Investment, the sources added.翻译:其中，维多贸易公司向印度石油公司(IOC.NS)出售了 150 万桶，向国营印度斯坦石油公司(HPCL.NS)和米塔尔能源投资公司的合资企业 HPCL-米塔尔能源公司 (HMEL) 出售了 50 万桶。消息人士补充道。

Reporting by Nidhi Verma in New Delhi, Marianna Parraga and Arathy Somasekhar in Houston, and Florence Tan and Muyu Xu in Singapore翻译:Nidhi Verma 在新德里、Marianna Parraga 和 Arathy Somasekhar 在休斯敦、Florence Tan 和 Muyu Xu 在新加坡报道

item.title: 随着比特币触及 19 个月高点，加密货币股票将于 12 月开始走高
item.description:
Shares of crypto miners and bitcoin-tracking companies climbed in premarket trading on Friday as the world's largest cryptocurrency extended a recent rally to touch a near 19-month high on improving risk appetite.翻译:由于风险偏好改善，全球最大的加密货币延续近期涨势，触及近 19 个月高点，周五盘前交易中，加密货币矿商和比特币追踪公司的股价上涨。

Bitcoin , up 2% at $38,410, has been gaining since October on optimism that a potential approval of a spot exchange-traded fund is likely to unleash more capital investments in the digital asset sector.翻译:比特币上涨 2%，至 38,410 美元，自 10 月份以来一直在上涨，因为人们乐观地认为，现货交易所交易基金的潜在批准可能会在数字资产领域释放更多资本投资。

"Tailwinds have been gathering strength all year, especially in recent months, as spot ETF expectations build, the Binance uncertainty is resolved, and 2024's accelerated money printing becomes more inevitable," crypto-focused economist Noelle Acheson said, referring to the bitcoin rally.翻译:专注于加密货币的经济学家 Noelle Acheson 在谈到比特币涨势时表示：“全年顺风顺水的势头一直在增强，尤其是近几个月，随着现货 ETF 预期的增强，币安的不确定性得到解决，2024 年的加速印钞变得更加不可避免。”

Shares of bitcoin miners - whose profitability improves as bitcoin climbs - including Riot Platforms (RIOT.O), Marathon Digital (MARA.O), Cipher Mining (CIFR.O) and TeraWulf (WULF.O) rose between 2.4% and 4% in trading before the bell.翻译:Riot Platforms (RIOT.O) 、Marathon Digital (MARA.O) 、Cipher Mining (CIFR.O)和 TeraWulf (WULF.O)等比特币矿商的股价上涨了 2.4% 至 4%，这些矿商的盈利能力随着比特币的上涨而提高。在开盘前的交易中。

J.P.Morgan raised its price targets on Cipher Mining, CleanSpark (CLSK.O), Iris Energy (IREN.O), Marathon Digital and Riot Platforms to reflect the rally in bitcoin.翻译:摩根大通上调了 Cipher Mining、CleanSpark (CLSK.O) 、Iris Energy (IREN.O) 、Marathon Digital 和 Riot Platforms 的价格目标，以反映比特币的上涨。

Shares of bitcoin mining machine maker Canaan (CAN.O) added nearly 4%.翻译:比特币矿机制造商 Canaan (CAN.O)股价上涨近 4%。

The mining companies are also increasing production before bitcoin's "halving" event next year, when rewards for producing the tokens are cut in half.翻译:矿业公司也在明年比特币“减半”事件之前增加产量，届时生产代币的奖励将减少一半。

Coinbase's shares (COIN.O) rose 2.6% following the 62% jump in November that outperformed bitcoin's 11% climb even as the U.S. crypto exchange reported a decline in trading volume earlier in the month.翻译:Coinbase 的股价(COIN.O)继 11 月份上涨 62% 后上涨 2.6%，表现优于比特币 11% 的涨幅，尽管美国加密货币交易所本月早些时候报告交易量下降。

"Higher crypto prices should lead to a boost in transaction volume and transaction revenues for Coinbase as we enter 2024," said CFRA Research analyst Michael Elliott.翻译:CFRA Research 分析师 Michael Elliott 表示：“进入 2024 年，加密货币价格上涨应该会导致 Coinbase 交易量和交易收入增加。”

However, Elliott cautioned the crypto exchange faces both legal challenges and new regulations that are likely to take time to play out and will continue to result in volatility for the stock.翻译:然而，埃利奥特警告说，加密货币交易所面临着法律挑战和新规定，这些挑战可能需要时间才能发挥作用，并将继续导致股票波动。

The ETF approval bets have helped counter latest concerns after Changpeng Zhao, the founder of the world's largest crypto exchange, stepped down and pleaded guilty to breaking U.S. anti-money laundering laws.翻译:全球最大加密货币交易所创始人赵长鹏辞职并承认违反美国反洗钱法后，ETF 的批准押注有助于平息最新的担忧。

Among other premarket gainers were U.S. software developer and bitcoin investor Microstrategy (MSTR.O), up nearly 5%, and ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITO.P), which added 2%.翻译:其他盘前上涨者包括美国软件开发商和比特币投资者 Microstrategy (MSTR.O) ，上涨近 5%，以及 ProShares Bitcoin Strategy ETF (BITO.P) ，上涨 2%。

Reporting by Medha Singh in Bengaluru; Editing by Sriraj Kalluvila翻译:Medha Singh 在班加罗尔的报道；斯里拉吉·卡鲁维拉 编辑

item.title: 美国限制中国企业和电池零部件获得电动汽车税收抵免
item.description:
The Biden administration on Friday issued-long awaited guidance that will limit Chinese content in batteries eligible for electric vehicle tax credits starting next year.翻译:拜登政府周五发布了期待已久的指导意见，该指导意见将从明年开始限制符合电动汽车税收抵免资格的电池中的中国成分。

In a win for automakers, the U.S. Treasury will temporarily exempt some trace critical minerals from new strict rules barring materials from China and other countries deemed a "Foreign Entity of Concern." (FEOC)翻译:为了汽车制造商的胜利，美国财政部将暂时免除一些痕量关键矿物，使其免受新的严格规定的限制，禁止来自中国和其他被视为“外国关注实体”的国家的材料。 （远东石油公司）

The new rules, required under an August 2022 law, are designed to wean the U.S. electric vehicle battery chain away from China and are being closely watched by automakers as they make investment decisions on producing batteries for their transition to electric vehicles.翻译:2022 年 8 月颁布的一项法律要求实施的新规定，旨在让美国电动汽车电池链脱离中国，汽车制造商在为向电动汽车过渡而做出电池生产投资决策时受到密切关注。

The FEOC rules come into effect in 2024 for completed batteries and 2025 for critical minerals used to produce them.翻译:FEOC 规则对于成品电池将于 2024 年生效，对于用于生产电池的关键矿物则于 2025 年生效。

The Alliance for Automotive Innovation, a group representing nearly all major automakers, said the decision to exempt trace materials for two years "was significant and well-advised" and without it could have made nearly all vehicles ineligible.翻译:代表几乎所有主要汽车制造商的汽车创新联盟表示，免除微量材料两年的决定“意义重大且明智”，否则几乎所有车辆都将不再符合资格。

Treasury said the few materials being exempted each account for less than 2% of the value of battery critical minerals.翻译:财政部表示，少数获得豁免的材料各自占电池关键矿物价值的不到 2%。

Ford Motor said in October it was awaiting the guidance to determine if its licensing agreement with Chinese battery maker CATL (300750.SZ), as part of the automaker's planned Michigan battery plant, would run afoul of the rules.翻译:福特汽车公司10月份表示，正在等待指导意见，以确定其与中国电池制造商CATL （300750.SZ）的许可协议（作为该汽车制造商计划的密歇根电池工厂的一部分）是否会违反规定。

The Energy Department said a company would be deemed a FEOC if owned or controlled by a named foreign government. Companies will also be ineligible if an entity of concern holds 25% of that entity’s board seats, voting rights, or equity.翻译:美国能源部表示，如果一家公司由指定外国政府拥有或控制，则该公司将被视为 FEOC。如果相关实体持有该实体 25% 的董事会席位、投票权或股权，该公司也将不符合资格。

Those countries include North Korea, China, Russia and Iran.翻译:这些国家包括朝鲜、中国、俄罗斯和伊朗。

The automaker group said "it appears that companies operating in China are considered FEOC. Chinese entities with specific ownership or governance structures might be permitted in certain circumstances."翻译:该汽车制造商集团表示，“看来在中国运营的公司被视为 FEOC。在某些情况下，具有特定所有权或治理结构的中国实体可能会被允许。”

The rules are expected to further reduce the number of electric vehicles eligible for EV tax credits. The law immediately made any vehicle ineligible if not assembled in North America. Earlier this year, new battery and mineral sourcing requirements took effect with price and buyer income eligibility caps from Jan. 1.翻译:预计这些规则将进一步减少有资格获得电动汽车税收抵免的电动汽车数量。该法律立即规定任何车辆如果不是在北美组装的，则不符合资格。今年早些时候，新的电池和矿物采购要求从 1 月 1 日起生效，价格和买家收入资格受到限制。

Senator Energy Committee chair Joe Manchin earlier this month urged Treasury to adopt the "strictest possible standards." Manchin noted China was responsible for 74% of the world’s cathode production, 92% of anode production, and 76% of lithium-ion battery cell production.翻译:参议员能源委员会主席乔·曼钦本月早些时候敦促财政部采用“尽可能严格的标准”。曼钦指出，中国占全球正极产量的74%、负极产量的92%和锂离子电池产量的76%。

Treasury said to allow compliant vehicles to qualify until the rules are finalized, it will have an expedited compliance method for automakers with clean supply chains.翻译:财政部表示，在规则最终确定之前，允许合规车辆符合资格，将为拥有清洁供应链的汽车制造商提供快速合规方法。

Reporting by David Shepardson and David Lawder in Washington; Editing by Chizu Nomiyama翻译:大卫·谢泼德森和大卫·劳德在华盛顿的报道；编辑：野宫千津
item.author: David Shepardson, David Lawder

item.title: 中国和越南正在考虑修建穿越稀土中心地带的铁路
item.description:
Summary:
  • China's foreign minister visits Hanoi amid plans for Xi's trip
  • Upgraded rail link may be part of Belt Road
  • China is top investor in Vietnam despite maritime tensions
翻译:概括：
  • 中国外交部长在习近平访问河内的计划中访问
  • 升级后的铁路线可能是“一带一路”的一部分
  • 尽管海上局势紧张，中国仍是越南最大投资者

China and Vietnam are working on a possible significant upgrade of their underdeveloped rail links to boost a line that crosses Vietnam's rare earths heartland and reaches the country's top port in the north, senior officials and diplomats said.翻译:高级官员和外交官表示，中国和越南正在努力对其欠发达的铁路线进行可能的重大升级，以加强一条穿越越南稀土中心地带并到达该国北部主要港口的线路。

The talks are part of preparations for a possible visit to Hanoi in coming weeks by Chinese President Xi Jinping, officials and diplomats said, which would further confirm Vietnam's increasingly strategic role in global supply chains as major powers including the United States vie to gain influence there.翻译:官员和外交官表示，这些会谈是中国国家主席习近平未来几周可能访问河内的准备工作的一部分，这将进一步证实越南在全球供应链中日益重要的战略作用，因为包括美国在内的主要大国都在争夺在那里的影响力。

The two countries agreed to boost trade ties and promote railways connections, according to a readout published on the Vietnamese government portal on Friday after China's top diplomat Wang Yi met Vietnamese leaders in Hanoi.翻译:中国最高外交官王毅在河内会见越南领导人后，越南政府门户网站上周五发布的消息称，两国同意加强贸易关系并促进铁路连接。

Vietnamese Prime Minister Pham Minh Chinh had previously called for the upgrade of the railway linking Kunming in southern China to Vietnam's port city of Haiphong in a statement released last month, after China's Commerce Minister Wang Wentao made a rare visit to Vietnam.翻译:在中国商务部长王文涛罕见访问越南后，越南总理范明正在上个月发布的一份声明中呼吁升级连接中国南部昆明和越南港口城市海防的铁路。

Chinese officials have stressed the importance of boosting infrastructure connectivity with their southern neighbour.翻译:中国官员强调了加强与南方邻国基础设施互联互通的重要性。

Vietnam already has rail connections to China, but the system is old with limited capacity on the Vietnam side. The two systems are also not interoperable at the moment, meaning trains have to stop at the border where passengers and goods are transferred to domestic services.翻译:越南已经与中国建立了铁路连接，但该系统陈旧，越南一侧的运力有限。目前，这两个系统还无法互操作，这意味着火车必须在边境停靠，乘客和货物才能转乘国内服务。

The upgraded railway would pass through the region where Vietnam has its largest deposits of rare earths, of which China is by far the world's biggest refiner.翻译:升级后的铁路将穿过越南拥有最大稀土矿藏的地区，而中国是迄今为止世界上最大的稀土精炼国。

Vietnam is trying to build its own industry in what is seen as a possible challenge to China's dominance, but what appear as internal fights have cast a shadow over these efforts.翻译:越南正试图建立自己的工业，这被视为可能挑战中国的主导地位，但看似内部的斗争给这些努力蒙上了阴影。

Chinese and Vietnamese rare earths industry experts discussed last week stronger cooperation on processing the minerals, according to Vietnamese state media.

BELT AND ROAD TRACK?

It is unclear how much China would contribute to the upgraded railway track in Vietnam and whether Hanoi would accept sizeable financing from Beijing on this.翻译:目前尚不清楚中国将为越南铁路升级改造贡献多少资金，以及河内是否会接受北京方面的巨额融资。

The line could be seen as part of China's flagship Belt and Road Initiative (BRI) which is supporting infrastructure investment across the world, but is not clear whether it would be labelled as a BRI project, one diplomat said.翻译:一位外交官表示，该线路可以被视为中国旗舰“一带一路”倡议的一部分，该倡议正在支持全球基础设施投资，但尚不清楚它是否会被标记为“一带一路”项目。

On Friday, the Vietnamese government said the two countries had completed negotiations to promote connections between infrastructure projects in Vietnam and the BRI.翻译:越南政府周五表示，两国已完成促进越南基础设施项目与“一带一路”倡议对接的谈判。

A strengthened railway link could also boost Vietnam's exports to China, mostly of agriculture products, boost Chinese tourism to northern Vietnam and further integrate the two countries' manufacturing industries, which experts already consider as symbiotic, with factories in Vietnam largely assembling components produced in China.翻译:加强铁路连接还可以促进越南对中国的出口，主要是农产品，促进中国对越南北部的旅游业，并进一步整合两国的制造业，专家已经认为这是共生的，越南的工厂主要组装中国生产的零部件。

China is Vietnam's largest trading partner and so far this year is also the main investor, taking into account investment from Hong Kong, as many Chinese companies move south some of their operations amid trade tensions between Beijing and Washington.翻译:中国是越南最大的贸易伙伴，考虑到来自香港的投资，今年迄今为止也是主要投资者，因为许多中国公司在北京和华盛顿之间的贸易紧张局势中将部分业务南迁。

Despite the booming economic links, the two communist nations are embroiled in a years-long maritime dispute in the South China Sea and fought a brief war in the late 70s.翻译:尽管经济联系蓬勃发展，但这两个共产主义国家却在南中国海卷入了长达数年的海上争端，并在 70 年代末爆发了短暂的战争。

Reporting Francesco Guarascio and Khanh Vu; additional reporting by Phuong Nguyen; Editing by Stephen Coates and Toby Chopra翻译:报道 Francesco Guarascio 和 Khanh Vu； Phuong Nguyen 的补充报告；斯蒂芬·科茨和托比·乔普拉编辑

item.title: 随着拼多多抢占中国最有价值电子商务公司的宝座，阿里巴巴因微软评级下调而下跌
item.description:
U.S.-listed shares of Alibaba Group Holding dipped on Friday following a Morgan Stanley downgrade on concerns over slower turnaround in its key businesses, just hours after rival PDD raced past to become the most valuable Chinese e-commerce firm.翻译:摩根士丹利因担心其关键业务周转速度放缓而下调其评级，周五在美国上市的阿里巴巴集团股价下跌，而就在几个小时前，阿里巴巴集团的竞争对手拼多多一举超越，成为中国最有价值的电子商务公司。

Alibaba's U.S. shares slipped 1.5% to $73.7 in premarket trading, tracking a fresh one-year low. They are down 14% since the company posted in line second-quarter revenue and scrapped plans to spin off its cloud business.翻译:阿里巴巴的美国股价在盘前交易中下跌 1.5% 至 73.7 美元，创一年新低。自该公司公布第二季度营收并取消剥离云业务的计划以来，该公司股价下跌了 14%。

Meanwhile, shares of PDD Holdings (PDD.O) have surged following stellar quarterly results from the Temu parent this week. The company closed with a market capitalization of nearly $196 billion on Thursday, surpassing Alibaba's market value of $190.45 billion.翻译:与此同时，继 Temu 母公司本周公布出色的季度业绩后，PDD Holdings (PDD.O)的股价大幅上涨。该公司周四收盘市值接近1960亿美元，超过阿里巴巴1904.5亿美元的市值。

Morgan Stanley analysts downgraded Alibaba to "equal-weight" from "overweight", flagging concerns over softness in its customer management revenue and cloud business due to sagging economic recovery in China.翻译:摩根士丹利分析师将阿里巴巴的评级从“增持”下调至“平配”，表达了对其客户管理收入和云业务因中国经济复苏疲软而疲软的担忧。

They also noted uncertainties from the decision to scrap the spin-off of its cloud business.翻译:他们还指出，取消分拆云业务的决定存在不确定性。

The brokerage cut its price target on the stock to $90 from $110, the second lowest on Wall Street, as per LSEG data.翻译:根据 LSEG 的数据，该券商将该股目标价从 110 美元下调至 90 美元，为华尔街第二低。

Alibaba's U.S. shares, down about 15% so far this year, are set for their third consecutive year of losses.翻译:阿里巴巴的美国股价今年迄今已下跌约15%，预计将连续第三年下跌。

On the other hand, Morgan Stanley named PDD as its top pick in the sector, saying the company is best placed to navigate the current economic environment with its heavy discounting steps.翻译:另一方面，摩根士丹利将拼多多列为该行业的首选，并表示该公司最有能力通过大幅折扣措施应对当前的经济环境。

"We expect PDD to continue to gain share in the domestic market thanks to its favorable business model amid consumers' behavior shift," Morgan Stanley's Eddy Wang noted, adding that its cross-border e-commerce business, Temu, is not fully valued by the market.翻译:摩根士丹利的 Eddy Wang 表示：“我们预计拼多多将在消费者行为转变的背景下，凭借其良好的商业模式，继续扩大国内市场份额。”他补充说，拼多多的跨境电商业务 Temu 并未得到充分重视。市场。

PDD shares were down 1.4% premarket at $145.4 but have surged more than 80% in 2023, handily outperforming its peers.翻译:PDD 股价盘前下跌 1.4%，至 145.4 美元，但 2023 年已飙升超过 80%，轻松跑赢同行。

item.title: 亚洲黄金 金价创下历史新高，加剧了印度节后需求的低迷
item.description:
Summary:
  • India dealers offer $9/oz discount
  • China premiums little changed at $25-$35/ounce this week
  • Sellers emerge as gold prices notch higher - traders
翻译:概括：
  • 印度经销商提供 9 美元/盎司折扣
  • 本周中国升水几乎没有变化，为 25-35 美元/盎司
  • 随着金价上涨，卖家出现——交易员

Physical gold dealers in India were forced to offer steeper discounts this week as record high prices accelerated a post-festival slowdown in demand, with the rise in local prices hurting activity in other Asian hubs as well.翻译:印度的实物黄金交易商本周被迫提供更大的折扣，因为创纪录的高价加速了节日后需求的放缓，而当地价格的上涨也损害了亚洲其他中心的活动。

Indian dealers offered discounts of up to $9 an ounce over official domestic prices — inclusive of 15% import and 3% sales levies — up from the last week's discounts of $6.翻译:印度经销商提供比国内官方价格最高每盎司 9 美元的折扣（包括 15% 的进口税和 3% 的销售税），高于上周的 6 美元折扣。

Demand was good for a few days after the Diwali festival last month, but rising prices have brought the market to a standstill, a New Delhi-based bullion dealer said.翻译:一位新德里金银交易商表示，上个月排灯节后几天需求良好，但价格上涨导致市场陷入停滞。

Local gold prices hit a record high of 62,675 rupees per 10 grams this week, and have risen more than 11% in two months.翻译:当地金价本周创下每10克62,675卢比的历史新高，两个月内上涨逾11%。

"Buyers are grappling with the sudden surge in prices. They are waiting to see whether prices will sustain at these levels," a Mumbai-based dealer with a bullion importing bank said.翻译:“买家正在努力应对价格的突然飙升。他们正在等待价格是否能维持在目前的水平，”一家金银进口银行的孟买交易商表示。

In top gold consumer China, dealers charged premiums of $25-$35 per ounce over global spot prices , which were hovering near a seven-month peak, versus the $20-$40 premiums last week.翻译:在最大的黄金消费国中国，交易商对全球现货价格收取了每盎司 25 至 35 美元的溢价，该价格徘徊在七个月高点附近，而上周的溢价为 20 至 40 美元。

However, "the absence of new import quotas, the Federal Reserve's interest rate trajectory, and escalating geopolitical and economic risks collectively suggest a positive trend for the gold premium in the coming year," said Bernard Sin, regional director of Greater China at MKS PAMP.翻译:不过，MKS PAMP 大中华区总监 Bernard Sin 表示，“新进口配额的缺失、美联储的利率轨迹以及不断升级的地缘政治和经济风险，共同表明未来一年黄金溢价将呈现积极趋势。” 。

Hong Kong dealers charged $1.00-$2.00 per ounce premiums. In Singapore, premiums rose slightly to $1.25- $3. .翻译:香港经销商收取每盎司 1.00-2.00 美元的溢价。在新加坡，保费小幅上涨至 1.25-3 美元。 。

"We are noticing a slowdown in buying activity (in Singapore) with retailers more willing to sell than buy at this level. Dealers' inventory remains more or less the same week on week," Hugo Pascal, precious metals trader at InProved said.翻译:InProved 贵金属交易员 Hugo Pascal 表示：“我们注意到（新加坡）购买活动放缓，零售商更愿意在这个水平上出售而不是购买。经销商的库存每周基本保持不变。”

In Japan, gold changed hands at anywhere between a $1 discount to $0.5 premium over global spot rates this week.翻译:在日本，本周黄金易手价格较全球现货价格有 1 美元折扣至 0.5 美元溢价之间。

Reporting by Harshit Verma, Anjana Anil in Bengaluru and Rajendra Jadhav in Mumbai, additional reporting by Brijesh Patel; editing by Arpan Varghese and Mrigank Dhaniwala翻译:Harshit Verma、Anjana Anil 在班加罗尔和 Rajendra Jadhav 在孟买的报道，Brijesh Patel 的补充报道；编辑：Arpan Varghese 和 Mrigank Dhaniwala

item.title: Signify 将在改造中裁员，每年节省 2 亿欧元
item.description:
Signify (LIGHT.AS) is to cut jobs as part of a restructuring that is targeting annual savings of 200 million euros ($218 million), sending shares in the world's biggest light maker up as much as 6.6%.翻译:Signify (LIGHT.AS)将进行裁员，作为重组的一部分，目标是每年节省 2 亿欧元（2.18 亿美元），这使得这家全球最大的照明制造商的股价上涨了 6.6%。

Signify, spun off from Dutch technology group Philips in 2016, has already been cutting costs, including through layoffs, in response to a sluggish recovery in key market China and lower sales volumes.翻译:2016年从荷兰科技集团飞利浦分拆出来的Signify已经在削减成本，包括通过裁员，以应对中国主要市场复苏缓慢和销量下降的情况。

"We will further adjust the size of our central organisation and reduce our costs to support the company's performance," CEO Eric Rondolat said in a statement.翻译:首席执行官埃里克·朗多拉特(Eric Rondolat)在一份声明中表示：“我们将进一步调整中央组织的规模并降低成本，以支持公司的业绩。”

A company spokesperson told Reuters the plan would involve "some job losses", without providing further details.翻译:公司发言人告诉路透社，该计划将涉及“一些失业”，但没有提供更多细节。

As part of the restructuring there will be four vertical businesses which will aim to enhance speed of execution and focus on customers, the group said.翻译:该集团表示，作为重组的一部分，将有四个垂直业务，旨在提高执行速度并以客户为中心。

The maker of LED lighting systems and electrical components said three of the new units would focus on customers, while the fourth would be dedicated to conventional lighting technologies.翻译:这家 LED 照明系统和电气元件制造商表示，其中三个新部门将专注于客户，而第四个部门将专注于传统照明技术。

Signify's shares rose 5.6% to 28.16 euros at 1110 GMT on Friday, among top performers on Europe's benchmark STOXX 600 index (.STOXX).翻译:格林尼治标准时间周五 1110 点，Signify 股价上涨 5.6%，至 28.16 欧元，在欧洲基准 STOXX 600 指数(.STOXX)中表现最佳。

Signify did not disclose how many people would be affected by the revamp, but reiterated its aim to keep non-manufacturing costs within 25%-29% of sales.翻译:Signify 没有透露有多少人会受到此次改造的影响，但重申其目标是将非制造成本控制在销售额的 25%-29% 之内。

In the third quarter, its adjusted indirect costs as a percentage of sales increased by 160 basis points to 30.2%.翻译:第三季度，调整后的间接成本占销售额的百分比增加了160个基点，达到30.2%。

Rondolat had said in October that the group was doing whatever it could to return the costs to a targeted range.翻译:Rondolat在 10 月份曾表示，该集团正在尽一切努力将成本控制在目标范围内。

J.P. Morgan said the magnitude of the cost saving plan was higher and came in earlier than the brokerage had expected.翻译:摩根大通表示，成本节约计划的规模更大，而且实施时间早于券商预期。

"The new segment structure will also improve the disclosure and bring Signify closer to the customers, " it added.翻译:它补充说：“新的部门结构还将改善信息披露，并使 Signify 更贴近客户。”

The changes will be implemented through 2024, with most of them set to be completed by the second quarter.翻译:这些变化将实施到 2024 年，其中大部分将于第二季度完成。

Signify's nominal sales fell by 13.8% in the third quarter hit by slow demand across its geographies, it said in October.翻译:Signify 10 月份表示，由于各地区需求放缓，第三季度名义销售额下降了 13.8%。

($1 = 0.9179 euros)翻译:（1 美元 = 0.9179 欧元）

item.title: 英国数据监管机构拒绝因基因组问题调查中国华大基因
item.description:
Britain's data regulator has resisted calls from lawmakers to investigate the prenatal tests of a Chinese gene company over how it handles the genomic data of consumers, letters reviewed by Reuters show.翻译:路透社看到的信件显示，英国数据监管机构拒绝了立法者就一家中国基因公司如何处理消费者基因组数据进行产前测试的呼吁。

Reuters has previously reported China's BGI Group was collecting genetic data from millions of women for research on the traits of populations using tests developed in collaboration with the country's military.翻译:路透社此前曾报道称，中国华大基因集团正在收集数百万女性的基因数据，以便利用与中国军方合作开发的测试来研究人群的特征。

British lawmakers from across the political spectrum had written to the Information Commissioner's Office (ICO) to ask for an investigation into privacy concerns around genome sequencing by BGI, citing the July 2021 Reuters report into the prenatal "NIFTY" tests, which detect abnormalities such as Down syndrome in a foetus.翻译:来自不同政治派别的英国立法者已写信给信息专员办公室 (ICO)，要求对华大基因基因组测序的隐私问题进行调查，并援引了 2021 年 7 月路透社对产前“NIFTY”测试的报告，该测试可检测诸如以下异常情况：胎儿患有唐氏综合症。

But in a letter seen by Reuters, the ICO said the threshold of evidence to carry out an investigation had not been reached.翻译:但在路透社看到的一封信中，ICO 表示尚未达到开展调查的证据门槛。

"We have not received any complaints from individuals concerned with how BGI Group have processed their data, and we have not received any evidence indicating that a breach has occurred," the ICO's letter to lawmakers said.翻译:ICO 在给立法者的信中表示：“我们没有收到任何有关 BGI 集团如何处理其数据的个人投诉，也没有收到任何表明发生违规行为的证据。”

Opposition Labour lawmaker Taiwo Owatemi said she was "dismayed" by the decision.翻译:反对党工党议员塔伊沃·奥瓦特米 (Taiwo Owatemi) 表示，她对这一决定感到“沮丧”。

"We are deeply concerned the ICO is not proactively delivering on its duty to protect the public," she said in a letter co-signed by fellow Labour lawmaker Siobhain McDonagh.翻译:她在工党议员西奥本·麦克唐纳 (Siobhain McDonagh) 共同签署的一封信中表示：“我们对 ICO 没有积极履行保护公众的职责深感担忧。”

Britain has so far not followed the likes of the United States which has added three units of BGI Group to its trade blacklist, including the Hong Kong lab where genetic samples from the prenatal tests are processed and stored.翻译:迄今为止，英国尚未效仿美国等国家，将华大基因集团的三个子公司列入其贸易黑名单，其中包括处理和储存产前检测基因样本的香港实验室。

BGI said it disagreed with the U.S trade blacklist decision, and said it "does not engage in unethical practices" and denied being involved in human rights abuses, including the surveillance of minority groups.翻译:华大基因表示不同意美国贸易黑名单的决定，并表示“不从事不道德行为”，并否认参与侵犯人权，包括监视少数群体。

"Our labs internationally, including the one in Hong Kong, meet stringent standards in data security," BGI Group said when asked for comment by Reuters about the British lawmakers' concerns and ICO decision.翻译:当路透社要求华大基因就英国立法者的担忧和 ICO 决定发表评论时，华大基因集团表示：“我们的国际实验室，包括香港的实验室，都符合严格的数据安全标准。”

"We have never been asked to provide, nor provided, testing data to Chinese authorities for national security or national defence purposes."翻译:“我们从未被要求或出于国家安全或国防目的向中国当局提供检测数据。”

Asked to comment further on the lawmakers' concerns, the ICO said it would "continue to engage with this issue should further information come to light" and that "international transfers of data remain a focus for the ICO".翻译:当被要求对立法者的担忧进一步发表评论时，ICO 表示，“如果有更多信息曝光，它将继续处理这个问题”，并且“国际数据传输仍然是 ICO 的重点”。

"In addition, we are currently reviewing genomic technologies and the novel and heightened privacy risks they pose," an ICO spokesperson said in an emailed comment.翻译:“此外，我们目前正在审查基因组技术及其带来的新的和更高的隐私风险，”ICO 发言人在一封电子邮件评论中表示。

British Deputy Prime Minister Oliver Dowden has said that Britain is considering labelling genomics as an area of "critical national infrastructure".翻译:英国副首相奥利弗·道登表示，英国正在考虑将基因组学标记为“关键国家基础设施”领域。

Reporting by Alistair Smout; Editing by Alison Williams翻译:阿利斯泰尔·斯莫特报道；艾莉森·威廉姆斯编辑
item.author: Alistair Smout

item.title: 中国习近平要求海警加强海事执法
item.description:
China's President Xi Jinping has said the country's coast guard must enforce maritime law and crack down on "criminal activities" to defend China's territorial sovereignty, state media reported on Friday.翻译:据官方媒体周五报道，中国国家主席习近平表示，中国海警必须执行海事法并打击“犯罪活动”，以捍卫中国的领土主权。

Xi made the comments as he inspected the China Coast Guard's command office for the East China Sea area and the performance of the coast guard's ships by video, Xinhua news agency reported.翻译:据新华社报道，习近平在视察中国海警东海指挥部和海警舰艇性能时作出上述表示。

"It is necessary to establish and improve the coordination and cooperation mechanism of maritime law enforcement, severely crack down on illegal and criminal activities at sea," Xi said.翻译:习近平指出，要建立健全海上执法协调配合机制，严厉打击海上违法犯罪活动。

The president also said it is necessary to "pragmatically carry out exchanges and cooperation with foreign countries in maritime law enforcement, and actively participate in international and regional maritime governance."翻译:总统还表示，要“务实开展与国外海上执法交流与合作，积极参与国际和地区海洋治理”。

The Chinese coast guard has had several confrontations with vessels from the Philippines in disputed territorial waters in the South China Sea.翻译:中国海警已在南海争议领海与菲律宾船只发生数次对抗。

China's top leader also said it was important to maintain the healthy development of China's marine economy.翻译:中国最高领导人还表示，保持中国海洋经济健康发展非常重要。

Reporting by Ella Cao and Bernard Orr, editing by Christina Fincher and Barbara Lewis翻译:艾拉·曹和伯纳德·奥尔报道，克里斯蒂娜·芬奇和芭芭拉·刘易斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 菲律宾在南海岛屿上建立新的海岸警卫队站
item.description:
The Philippines has built a new coast guard station on the contested island of Thitu in the South China Sea, boosting its ability to monitor movements of Chinese vessels and aircraft in the busy disputed waterway.翻译:菲律宾在南海有争议的中业岛上建立了一个新的海岸警卫队站，增强了其监控中国船只和飞机在繁忙的争议航道上活动的能力。

As tension mounts over territorial claims in the area, the Philippine coast guard had early this year spotted a Chinese navy ship and dozens of militia vessels around the island, one of nine features Manila occupies in the Spratly archipelago.翻译:随着该地区领土主张的紧张局势加剧，菲律宾海岸警卫队今年年初在该岛周围发现了一艘中国海军舰艇和数十艘民兵船只，该岛是马尼拉在南沙群岛占据的九个岛礁之一。

Inaugurated on Friday, the new three-storey facility is equipped with state-of-the art technology such as radar, automatic identification, satellite communication, and coastal cameras, the Philippine coast guard said in a statement.翻译:菲律宾海岸警卫队在一份声明中表示，这座新的三层设施于周五落成，配备了雷达、自动识别、卫星通信和沿海摄像机等最先进的技术。

"The behaviour of the Chinese coast guard, People's Liberation Army (PLA) Navy and Chinese militias are sometimes unpredictable," Eduardo Ano, the Philippine national security adviser, said during a visit to the island.翻译:菲律宾国家安全顾问爱德华多·阿诺在访问该岛时表示：“中国海警、中国人民解放军海军和中国民兵的行为有时难以预测。”

"They do not adhere to the international order, to the rule of law," he told reporters on Friday.翻译:“他们不遵守国际秩序和法治，”他周五告诉记者。

"What they're describing as gray-zone tactics ... are pure bullying and it's purely illegal. It's not acceptable in the international order."翻译:“他们所描述的灰色地带策略……纯粹是欺凌行为，完全是非法的。这在国际秩序中是不可接受的。”

The Chinese embassy in Manila did not immediately respond to a request for comment.翻译:中国驻马尼拉大使馆没有立即回应置评请求。

Manila's outpost of Thitu is its biggest and most strategically important in the South China Sea, largely claimed by Beijing, despite conflicting territorial claims by several regional nations.翻译:马尼拉的中业岛前哨基地是其在南中国海最大、最具战略意义的前哨基地，尽管该地区多个国家的领土主张存在冲突，但北京主要声称对南海拥有主权。

Known locally as Pag-asa, Thitu lies about 300 miles (480 km) west of the Philippine province of Palawan. Home to about 200 people, it is used by Manila to maintain its territorial claim.翻译:中业岛在当地被称为 Pag-asa，位于菲律宾巴拉望省以西约 300 英里（480 公里）处。这里居住着约 200 人，马尼拉用它来维持其领土主张。

Besides the Philippines, Brunei, China, Malaysia, Taiwan and Vietnam have competing claims of sovereignty in the South China Sea, a conduit for goods in excess of $3 trillion every year.翻译:除菲律宾外，文莱、中国、马来西亚、台湾和越南也对南海提出主权主张，南海是每年超过 3 万亿美元商品的通道。

Reporting by Karen Lema and Mikhail Flores; Editing by Clarence Fernandez翻译:凯伦·莱玛 (Karen Lema) 和米哈伊尔·弗洛雷斯 (Mikhail Flores) 报道；克拉伦斯·费尔南德斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 我们对中国呼吸系统疾病激增了解多少？
item.description:
A request by the World Health Organization for more information on a surge in respiratory illnesses and clusters of pneumonia in children in China has attracted global attention.翻译:世界卫生组织要求提供有关中国呼吸道疾病激增和儿童聚集性肺炎的更多信息，引起了全球关注。

Health authorities have not detected any unusual or novel pathogens, the WHO later said, and doctors and public health researchers say there is no evidence for international alarm.翻译:世界卫生组织后来说，卫生当局尚未发现任何不寻常或新颖的病原体，医生和公共卫生研究人员表示，没有证据表明国际社会发出警报。

Authorities in Taiwan, however, this week advised the elderly, very young and those with poor immunity to avoid travel to China.翻译:然而，台湾当局本周建议老年人、幼儿和免疫力差的人避免前往中国大陆。

The following is what we know about the surge in illness in the world's second most populous country so far, and why experts think there is no need to panic.

WHAT IS HAPPENING ON THE GROUND?

The rise in respiratory illnesses comes as China braces for its first full winter season since it lifted strict COVID-19 restrictions in December last year.翻译:呼吸道疾病的增加正值中国准备迎接自去年 12 月取消严格的 COVID-19 限制以来的第一个完整冬季。

The spike in illness came into the spotlight when the WHO asked China for more information last week, citing a report by the Program for Monitoring Emerging Diseases (ProMED) on clusters of undiagnosed pneumonia in children.翻译:上周，世界卫生组织援引新发疾病监测计划（ProMED）关于儿童未确诊肺炎群发的报告，要求中国提供更多信息，使疾病激增成为人们关注的焦点。

Some social media users have also posted photos of children receiving intravenous drips in hospital, while media in cities such as Xian in the northwest have posted videos of crowded hospitals, fanning concerns potential strains on the healthcare system.

HOW BIG IS THE SURGE?

The National Health Commission told a news conference on Nov. 13 that there was an increase in incidence of respiratory disease without providing further details.翻译:国家卫健委在11月13日的新闻发布会上表示，呼吸道疾病发病率有所上升，但没有提供更多细节。

WHO China told Reuters in an email that "Chinese health authorities advised that the current numbers they are observing is not greater than the peak in the most recent cold season prior to the COVID-19 pandemic".

WHAT PATHOGENS ARE CIRCULATING?

The data suggests the increase is linked to the lifting of COVID-19 restrictions along with the circulation of known pathogens such as mycoplasma pneumoniae, a common bacterial infection that typically affects younger children and which has circulated since May.翻译:数据表明，这一增长与取消 COVID-19 限制以及肺炎支原体等已知病原体的传播有关，肺炎支原体是一种常见的细菌感染，通常影响年幼的儿童，自 5 月份以来一直在传播。

Influenza, respiratory syncytial virus (RSV) and adenovirus have been in circulation since October.

IS MYCOPLASMA PNEUMONIAE A BIG WORRY?

One concern about the surge in respiratory illness is mycoplasma pneumoniae, which has also spiked in other countries.翻译:呼吸道疾病激增的一个担忧是肺炎支原体，这种疾病在其他国家也出现激增。

Maria Van Kerkhove, COVID-19 Technical Lead at the World Health Organization told reporters on Wednesday that mycoplasma pneumonia is not a reportable disease to the WHO, and it was on the rise for the last couple of months but now appears to be declining.翻译:世界卫生组织 COVID-19 技术负责人 Maria Van Kerkhove 周三告诉记者，支原体肺炎不是世界卫生组织可报告的疾病，过去几个月它的发病率呈上升趋势，但现在似乎正在下降。

"We're following up through our clinical networks and working with clinicians in China to better understand resistance to antibiotics, which is a problem across the world, but is a particular problem in the Western Pacific and South East Asia region," she said.翻译:她说：“我们正在通过我们的临床网络进行跟进，并与中国的临床医生合作，以更好地了解抗生素耐药性，这是世界各地的一个问题，但在西太平洋和东南亚地区是一个特殊的问题。”

Rajib Dasgupta, an epidemiologist and professor of community health at Jawaharlal Nehru University in New Delhi, told Reuters in some cases there may be serious complications from infection caused by mycoplasma pneumoniae, but most people will recover without antibiotics.

WHY EXPERTS AREN'T CONCERNED?

Doctors in China and experts abroad are not too worried about the situation in China, noting many other countries saw similar increases in respiratory diseases after easing pandemic measures.翻译:中国的医生和国外的专家对中国的情况并不太担心，他们指出，在放松流行病措施后，许多其他国家的呼吸道疾病也出现了类似的增长。

"The cases that we are seeing is nothing unusual at the moment, because it's still the same cough, colds, fever presentation, and the good thing about it is that it's actually treatable," said Cecille Brion, head of the pediatrics department at Raffles Medical Group Beijing.翻译:莱佛士医院儿科主任塞西尔·布里昂 (Cecille Brion) 表示：“目前我们看到的病例并不罕见，因为仍然是同样的咳嗽、感冒、发烧症状，好处是它实际上是可以治疗的。”北京医疗集团.

Van Kerkhove said that the rise in cases was expected.翻译:范科霍夫表示，病例增加是预料之中的。

"We are seeing, in general, an increase in respiratory infections around the world. We do tend to see increases in children because they're the school-aged children, and in the northern hemisphere it's the autumn already. We're entering the winter months," she said.翻译:“总体而言，我们看到世界各地的呼吸道感染有所增加。我们确实倾向于看到儿童的增加，因为他们是学龄儿童，而在北半球，已经是秋天了。我们正在进入冬天，”她说。

item.title: 独家：中国在选举前以廉价旅行吸引数百名台湾政客
item.description:
Beijing has sponsored cut-price trips to China for hundreds of Taiwanese politicians ahead of key elections on the island, according to Taiwan sources and documents, unnerving officials with a broad campaign that one called "election interference".翻译:据台湾消息人士和文件称，北京在岛上的重大选举之前赞助了数百名台湾政界人士前往中国大陆的低价旅行，这场被称为“选举干预”的广泛活动让官员们感到不安。

President Tsai Ing-wen and other Taiwan officials have warned that China might try to sway voters toward candidates seeking closer ties with Beijing in the elections, which could define the island's relations with China. But the scale of the Chinese activity has not previously been reported.翻译:总统蔡英文和其他台湾官员警告说，中国可能会试图在选举中引导选民支持那些寻求与北京建立更密切关系的候选人，这可能会决定台湾与中国的关系。但此前并未报道过中国活动的规模。

Beijing, which claims democratically governed Taiwan as its own and has ramped up military and political pressure to force the island to accept its sovereignty, frames the Jan. 13 presidential and legislative elections as a choice between "peace and war", calling the ruling party dangerous separatists and urging Taiwanese to make the "right choice".翻译:北京声称对台湾实行民主治理，并加大了军事和政治压力，迫使台湾接受其主权，将1月13日的总统选举和立法院选举视为“和平与战争”之间的选择，并称执政党危险的分裂分子并敦促台湾人做出“正确的选择”。

Taiwanese law forbids election campaigns from receiving money from "external hostile forces", including China, and prosecutors in southern Taiwan this week said they were investigating 22 people, including grassroots politicians, for potential violations of election and security laws.翻译:台湾法律禁止竞选活动接受来自包括中国在内的“外部敌对势力”的资金，台湾南部检察官本周表示，他们正在调查包括草根政客在内的 22 人，涉嫌违反选举法和安全法。

Across Taiwan security agencies are looking into more than 400 visits to China in the past month, most led by local opinion leaders such as borough chiefs and village heads, a Taiwan security official looking into China's activities told Reuters.翻译:一名调查中国活动的台湾安全官员告诉路透社，过去一个月，台湾各地的安全机构正在调查 400 多次对中国的访问，其中大多数是由当地意见领袖（例如区长和村长）领导的。

The agencies believe the trips, with discounted accommodations, transportation and meals, were subsidised by units under China's Taiwan Affairs Office, said the person, who requested anonymity due to the sensitivity of the matter.翻译:该人士表示，这些机构认为，这些住宿、交通和餐饮折扣的旅行是由中国台湾事务办公室下属单位提供补贴的。由于此事敏感，该人士要求匿名。

The Chinese office did not respond to a request for comment. It has previously said it respects Taiwan's "social systems" when commenting on the elections.翻译:中国办公室没有回应置评请求。它此前曾表示在评论选举时尊重台湾的“社会制度”。

Asked for comment, Taiwan's Mainland Affairs Council, the top China-policy body, referred Reuters to comments this week by its minister, Chiu Tai-san. He said it was "self-evident" Beijing was trying to sway Taiwan elections through means including free trips for politicians.翻译:在被要求置评时，台湾最高的中国政策机构陆委会向路透社转介了其部长邱大山本周的评论。他表示，北京正试图通过政客免费旅行等手段影响台湾选举，这是“不言而喻的”。

"They have already made it clear that a so-called 'right choice' has to be made, meaning choosing candidates that the Chinese Communist Party prefers," he told reporters without elaborating.

'ELECTION INTERFERENCE'

People taking these trips typically pay their own airfare, but other expenses are offered by Chinese authorities, officials looking into the matter said.翻译:调查此事的官员表示，参加这些旅行的人通常自己支付机票费用，但其他费用由中国当局提供。

"Election interference has started under the name of group tours," said a second Taiwan security official, who was briefed on the matter, adding Beijing was targeting politicians crucial to the island's administrative systems who play key roles in shaping public opinion.翻译:另一位获悉此事的台湾安全官员表示：“选举干扰是以团体旅游的名义开始的。”他补充说，北京的目标是对台湾行政系统至关重要的政客，他们在塑造公众舆论方面发挥着关键作用。

More than 300 borough chiefs or village heads from populous central Taiwan alone have participated in such trips to China in the past few months, this person said.翻译:这位人士表示，过去几个月，仅人口稠密的台湾中部就有 300 多名区长或村长参加了此类中国之行。

More than 20 borough chiefs from a district of the capital Taipei joined a China-sponsored trip to Shanghai with their families in September, while more than 10 people from an association for local politicians in neighbouring New Taipei City joined a trip this week, according to two security reports reviewed by Reuters.翻译:据报道，9月份，来自首都台北一个区的20多名区长与家人一起参加了中国赞助的上海之旅，而邻近的新北市地方政治家协会的10多名人士本周也参加了一次旅行。路透社审阅了两份安全报告。

The number from the Taipei district has "increased significantly" compared with elections four years ago and registrations have been "fairly enthusiastic", one report said. "Certain borough chiefs have become the window of contacts in Taiwan for some Chinese units."翻译:一份报告称，与四年前的选举相比，台北选区的人数“显着增加”，登记“相当热情”。 “某些区长已成为一些中方单位在台的联络窗口。”

So far this year, more than 1,000 borough chiefs or village heads joined such trips, more than last time, the second official said, adding China was targeting electoral districts where support was strong for candidates campaigning for closer China ties.

HARD TO BUILD A LEGAL CASE

In the investigation in the southern city of Kaohsiung, prosecutors said they believed the five trips from there were fully funded by China's Taiwan Affairs Office.翻译:在南部城市高雄的调查中，检察官表示，他们相信从那里出发的五次旅行完全由中国台湾事务办公室资助。

Chinese officials allegedly asked participants to support certain political parties and "oppose Taiwan independence", the prosecutors said in a statement.翻译:检察官在一份声明中表示，据称中国官员要求参与者支持某些政党并“反对台独”。

"There is no such thing as a free lunch," Prosecutor-General Hsing Tai-chao said on Thursday. He said external forces were trying to influence citizens in an "unprecedented fashion" and urged Taiwanese not to accept perks or instructions from Chinese authorities when travelling there.翻译:“天下没有免费的午餐，”检察长邢台超周四表示。他表示，外部势力正试图以“前所未有的方式”影响公民，并敦促台湾人在台湾旅行时不要接受中国当局的福利或指示。

Building criminal cases against trip-takers is challenging, security officials said, because it can be hard to establish a money trail to Chinese state agencies behind the tours, which often come much below going market rate, and to establish what was said during meetings with Chinese officials.翻译:安全官员表示，对旅游者提起刑事诉讼具有挑战性，因为很难确定旅游背后的中国国家机构的资金来源（这些资金往往远低于市场价格），也很难确定在与旅游团的会面中所说的内容。中国官员。

Taiwan suspended group tours to China via travel agencies after the COVID-19 pandemic, but there are no restrictions on individuals visiting.翻译:COVID-19 大流行后，台湾暂停了通过旅行社前往中国的团体旅游，但对个人访问没有限制。

Recent government scrutiny has prompted some politicians to be more low-key about such trips, the two officials said, with some making arrangements separately, then gathering in China.翻译:两位官员表示，最近政府的审查促使一些政界人士对此类访问更加低调，其中一些人分别做出安排，然后聚集在中国。

"They now even avoid sitting in seats next to one another during their flight."翻译:“他们现在甚至避免在飞行过程中坐在彼此相邻的座位上。”

item.title: 调查显示，11月份中国新建住宅价格连续第三个月上涨
item.description:
China's new home prices rose slightly for a third straight month in November, a private survey showed on Friday, as the crisis-hit property sector struggles to stabilise despite a slew of government support measures.翻译:周五的一项私人调查显示，中国11月份新房价格连续第三个月小幅上涨，尽管政府采取了一系列支持措施，但受危机打击的房地产行业仍难以企稳。

Prices rose 0.05% on average from the previous month after gains of 0.07% and 0.05%, according to the survey by real estate research firm China Index Academy.翻译:房地产研究公司中国指数研究院的调查显示，继上涨0.07%和0.05%之后，价格平均环比上涨0.05%。

Only 38 of the 100 cities surveyed reported increases in new home prices.翻译:接受调查的 100 个城市中，只有 38 个城市报告新房价格上涨。

China's property sector, which makes up about one-quarter of the world's second-biggest economy, has stumbled from crisis to crisis in a major blow to consumer and investor confidence, keeping economic growth from resuming a solid footing this year.翻译:中国的房地产行业约占全球第二大经济体的四分之一，该行业在一次又一次的危机中陷入困境，对消费者和投资者的信心造成重大打击，导致今年的经济增长无法恢复稳固的基础。

Government support for the property sector in recent months has included easing curbs on home purchases and cutting mortgage costs.翻译:近几个月来，政府对房地产行业的支持包括放松购房限制和降低抵押贷款成本。

China Index Academy said in a report the policy direction for the national property market was clear, and support from the supply and demand sides was expected to continue until the market shows recovery.翻译:中国指数研究院在报告中表示，全国楼市政策方向明确，供需双方的支持预计将持续到市场出现复苏。

A Reuters poll on Wednesday found expectations for 1% growth in new home prices next year, little changed from an August poll.翻译:路透社周三的一项民意调查发现，明年新房价格增长 1% 的预期与 8 月份的民意调查相比几乎没有变化。

"Beijing is turning more proactive to stabilise growth and the new dual-track housing model may help stabilise the property sector in the coming quarters," HSBC said on Thursday.翻译:汇丰银行周四表示，“北京正在更加积极主动地稳定经济增长，新的双轨住房模式可能有助于在未来几个季度稳定房地产行业。”

"This includes making affordable housing accessible and allowing the commercial real estate to return to its commercial nature, i.e., it could be for living or for speculation."翻译:“这包括提供经济适用房，并让商业地产回归其商业性质，即可以用于居住，也可以用于投机。”

Reporting by Liangping Gao and Ryan Woo; Editing by William Mallard翻译:高亮平、吴瑞安报道；威廉·马拉德编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 中国恒大债权人在新提案中寻求控股权
item.description:
A group of offshore creditors to China Evergrande Group (3333.HK) is asking for a controlling equity stake of the developer and two of its Hong Kong subsidiaries as part of company's revised debt restructuring proposal, a source familiar with the matter said on Friday.翻译:一位知情人士周五表示，中国恒大集团（3333.HK）的一组海外债权人正在要求获得该开发商及其两家香港子公司的控股权，作为该公司修订后的债务重组方案的一部分。

Bloomberg News first reported the request on Friday, citing people familiar with the matter.翻译:彭博新闻社周五首先援引知情人士的话报道了这一请求。

The group, which works as an ad hoc group of Evergrande's offshore creditors, made the request after the developer earlier this week made a new offer to repay their offshore debts, the source said.翻译:消息人士称，该小组是恒大海外债权人的一个特别小组，在恒大本周早些时候提出偿还其海外债务的新提议后，提出了这一要求。

Reuters reported on Thursday that Evergrande had offered to swap some offshore debt into equity in the company and two Hong Kong-listed units, and repay the rest with non-tradeable "certificates" backed by offshore assets.翻译:路透社周四报道称，恒大集团已提出将部分离岸债务转换为该公司和两家香港上市子公司的股权，并以离岸资产支持的不可交易“证书”偿还其余部分。

Evergrande has until a Hong Kong court hearing on Monday to present a "concrete" revised debt restructuring proposal for offshore creditors, a judge said last month after its original plan had lapsed.翻译:上个月，在恒大原计划失效后，一名法官表示，恒大必须在周一香港法庭听证会上向海外债权人提交一份“具体的”修订后的债务重组方案。

The source declined to be named as the discussions were private.翻译:由于讨论是私下进行，消息人士拒绝透露姓名。

Evergrande declined to comment.翻译:恒大拒绝置评。

Reporting by Xie Yu in Hong Kong, Gnaneshwar Rajan in Bengaluru; Editing by Stephen Coates翻译:谢宇香港报道，Gnaneshwar Rajan 班加罗尔报道；斯蒂芬·科茨编辑

item.title: 马来西亚邀请中国习近平访华并提高旅游目标
item.description:
Malaysia has invited China's President Xi Jingping to visit, its ambassador to Beijing said on Friday, as the Southeast Asian country also seeks to boost the number of Chinese tourists to five million a year to fuel economic growth.翻译:马来西亚驻北京大使周五表示，马来西亚已邀请中国国家主席习近平访问，该东南亚国家还寻求将中国游客数量增加到每年 500 万人次，以推动经济增长。

China and Malaysia will mark the 50th anniversary of their bilateral diplomatic relations next year, and Malaysia recently announced tourists from China would be able to travel visa free for 30 days, a move mirroring Thailand.翻译:中国和马来西亚明年将庆祝双边建交50周年，马来西亚最近宣布中国游客将可以免签旅行30天，此举与泰国类似。

Government data showed Malaysia welcomed 498,540 Chinese tourists in the six months to June this year, a figure almost a third of pre-pandemic levels. In comparison, Thailand said it expected 3.4-3.5 million visitors from China this year.翻译:政府数据显示，今年截至6月的六个月内，马来西亚接待了498,540名中国游客，这一数字几乎是大流行前水平的三分之一。相比之下，泰国预计今年将有 340 至 350 万名中国游客。

"We see that we have a big capacity to receive tourists," Ambassador Norman Muhamad said at an event at the Malaysian embassy in Beijing, adding that the goal is not "far-fetched" even if it may take more than a couple of years to achieve.翻译:大使诺曼·穆罕默德在马来西亚驻北京大使馆举行的一次活动中表示：“我们看到我们有很大的接待游客的能力。”他补充说，这一目标并不“牵强”，即使可能需要几年以上的时间实现。

"Since we are seeking more investment from China, this visa-free travel to Malaysia will also help Chinese investors to come to Malaysia to find opportunities," he added.翻译:他补充说：“由于我们正在寻求更多来自中国的投资，马来西亚的免签证旅行也将有助于中国投资者来马来西亚寻找机会。”

Malaysia's economic growth is expected to meet the government's target of 4% this year, driven in part by stronger tourism.翻译:马来西亚今年的经济增长预计将达到政府 4% 的目标，部分原因是旅游业的强劲增长。

Malaysia's Prime Minister Anwar Ibrahim has also invited China's President Xi Jinping to visit the country, Norman said.翻译:诺曼说，马来西亚总理安瓦尔·易卜拉欣还邀请中国国家主席习近平访问该国。

"We are hoping that President Xi will consent to visiting Malaysia," he added.翻译:“我们希望习主席同意访问马来西亚，”他补充道。

Earlier this week, China's foreign minister Wang Yi was seen holding hands with his Malaysian counterpart Zambry Abdul Kadir in New York, photos released by the Chinese foreign ministry show.翻译:中国外交部发布的照片​​显示，本周早些时候，中国外交部长王毅在纽约与马来西亚外长赞布里·阿卜杜勒·卡迪尔手牵着手。

item.title: 对比中国 11 月工厂调查凸显需要采取更强有力的刺激措施
item.description:
Mixed factory activity data for China in November suggests more stimulus will be needed to shore up economic growth, analysts said on Friday, as two surveys came to contrasting conclusions on the sector's health.翻译:分析师周五表示，中国 11 月份工厂活动数据好坏参半，表明需要采取更多刺激措施来支撑经济增长，因为两项调查对该行业健康状况得出了截然不同的结论。

China's economy has struggled to mount a strong post-COVID recovery due to an ailing housing market, local government debt risks and slow global growth. That has squeezed factory owners who have had to contend with high input costs, overcapacity, soft demand, and officials prioritising rescuing other parts of the economy.翻译:由于房地产市场不景气、地方政府债务风险和全球经济增长放缓，中国经济在疫情后难以实现强劲复苏。这对工厂主造成了压力，他们不得不应对高投入成本、产能过剩、需求疲软以及优先拯救经济其他部分的官员。

The Caixin/S&P Global manufacturing purchasing managers' index (PMI) unexpectedly rose to 50.7 in November from a 49.5 reading in October.翻译:财新/标普全球制造业采购经理人指数 (PMI) 意外从 10 月份的 49.5 升至 11 月份的 50.7。

That was the fastest expansion in three months, but stands in contrast to the official PMI which fell to 49.4 on Thursday. The 50-point mark separates growth from contraction.翻译:这是三个月来最快的扩张，但与周四跌至49.4 的官方 PMI 形成鲜明对比。 50分是增长与收缩的分界线。

"At face value, the average of the two is consistent with factory activity remaining largely unchanged last month," said Sheana Yue, China economist at Capital Economics.翻译:凯投宏观(Capital Economics)中国经济学家谢娜·岳(Sheana Yue)表示：“从表面上看，两者的平均值与上个月工厂活动基本保持不变是一致的。”

"But that may not be the case in practice - the hard data have held up better than survey-based measures lately."翻译:“但实际情况可能并非如此——硬数据最近比基于调查的措施更有效。”

The official and Caixin surveys have different samples, with the Caixin PMI focusing on export-oriented enterprises and small- and medium-sized enterprises in the country's coastal region.翻译:官方和财新调查的样本不同，财新PMI主要针对沿海地区的出口导向型企业和中小企业。

"The economy is running at different speeds across industries, though we expect the policy stance to remain proactive which will help to sustain overall growth momentum into the coming quarters," economists at HSBC said on Thursday.翻译:汇丰银行经济学家周四表示：“各行业经济运行速度不同，但我们预计政策立场将保持积极主动，这将有助于维持未来几个季度的整体增长势头。”

The Caixin survey data was supported by the quickest rise since June in new orders received by Chinese goods producers in November, but in the official survey new orders dipped back into contraction.翻译:财新调查数据得到了11月份中国商品生产商收到的新订单自6月份以来最快增长的支撑，但官方调查显示新订单再次陷入萎缩。

The official survey has contracted for seven out of the past eight months, while the Caixin survey has been more volatile, dipping in and out of contraction three times over the same period.翻译:过去八个月中，官方调查有七个月出现收缩，而财新调查的波动性更大，同一时期内出现了三次收缩。

The last time the official indicator was negative for more than three consecutive months was in the six months to October 2019, suggesting pessimism has become entrenched among some factory owners.翻译:官方指标上一次连续三个月以上为负值是在截至2019年10月的六个月内，这表明一些工厂主的悲观情绪已经根深蒂固。

"I don't think there can be a fix," said Dan Wang, chief economist at Hang Seng Bank China on Thursday, warning factory activity was unlikely to improve anytime soon as other economic problems dominate.翻译:恒生银行中国首席经济学家王丹周四表示：“我认为没有解决办法。”他警告说，由于其他经济问题占主导地位，工厂活动不太可能很快改善。

"The priority now is clearly containing the local government debt risk and the risk posed by regional banks."翻译:“现在的首要任务显然是控制地方政府债务风险和地方银行带来的风险。”

China's consumer prices swung lower in October, as key gauges of domestic demand pointed to weakness not seen since the pandemic, while factory-gate deflation deepened.翻译:中国十月份的消费者价格下跌，因为国内需求的关键指标显示出自疫情大流行以来未见的疲软，同时工厂通货紧缩加剧。

In a nod to the need to step up support for industry, Chinese president Xi Jinping visited the Yangtze River Delt region on Thursday. He called for closer integration across the sprawling industrial hub encompassing several major cities with millions of people, as well as China's biggest port in Shanghai.翻译:为了加强对工业的支持，中国国家主席习近平周四访问了长江三角洲地区。他呼吁在这个庞大的工业中心进行更紧密的整合，其中包括几个拥有数百万人口的主要城市以及中国最大的港口上海。

But weak external demand remained an important factor affecting factory activity in both surveys, with the new export index registering 49.0 and contracting for a fifth consecutive month in November in the Caixin survey and 46.8 in the official one.翻译:但在两次调查中，外部需求疲软仍然是影响工厂活动的重要因素，财新调查显示，11月份新出口指数为49.0，连续第五个月收缩，官方调查为46.8。

Payroll cuts in the sector persisted for the third month in the Caixin survey and a ninth month in the official PMI.翻译:财新调查显示，该行业已连续第三个月削减工资，官方 PMI 数据显示，该行业已连续第九个月削减工资。

Reporting by Liangping Gao and Joe Cash; Editing by Jacqueline Wong and Lincoln Feast.翻译:高亮平和乔·卡什的报道；杰奎琳·王和林肯·费斯特编辑。

item.title: 美国立法者寻求对中国无人机制造商Autel Robotics进行调查
item.description:
A bipartisan group of 11 U.S. House lawmakers on Thursday asked the Biden administration to investigate and potentially sanction Chinese drone maker Autel Robotics, citing national security concerns.翻译:周四，由 11 名美国众议院议员组成的两党小组以国家安全为由，要求拜登政府调查并可能制裁中国无人机制造商 Autel Robotics。

The letter, signed by House China select committee chair Mike Gallagher, a Republican, and the panel's top Democrat, Raja Krishnamoorthi, asked the Commerce, Defense and Treasury departments to investigate Autel Robotics, whose parent company is Autel Intelligent Technology (688208.SS).翻译:这封信由众议院中国特别委员会主席、共和党人迈克·加拉格尔(Mike Gallagher)和该委员会的民主党领袖拉贾·克里希纳莫蒂(Raja Krishnamoorthi)签署，要求商务部、国防部和财政部调查Autel Robotics，其母公司是Autel智能科技(688208.SS) 。

The letter said Autel Robotics is openly affiliated with China's People’s Liberation Army (PLA) "and poses a direct threat to U.S. national security as local law enforcement and state and local governments are purchasing and operating Autel drones, potentially exposing sensitive data across the country."翻译:信中称，Autel Robotics 公开隶属于中国人民解放军（PLA），“对美国国家安全构成直接威胁，因为地方执法部门以及州和地方政府正在购买和操作 Autel 无人机，可能会泄露全国各地的敏感数据。” ”

The Pentagon said it would respond to the lawmakers' letter. Commerce and Treasury did not immediately comment. Autel could not immediately be reached for comment.翻译:五角大楼表示将对议员们的信函做出回应。商务部和财政部没有立即发表评论。未能立即联系到 Autel 置评。

Another signer of the letter, Republican Representative Elise Stefanik, said, "Autel drones made in Communist China present an unacceptable national security risk and should not be allowed to operate in America."翻译:这封信的另一位签署人、共和党众议员埃莉斯·斯特凡尼克(Elise Stefanik)表示，“共产主义中国制造的Autel无人机构成了不可接受的国家安全风险，不应被允许在美国运营。”

The Commerce Department in 2020 imposed export restrictions on China-based drone manufacturer DJI, accusing it of complicity in the oppression of China's Uyghur minority and helping the military.翻译:美国商务部于 2020 年对中国无人机制造商大疆创新实施了出口限制，指责其共谋压迫中国维吾尔少数民族并帮助军方。

The lawmakers asked if Autel should face similar restrictions, citing concerns that Autel technology was used in Xinjiang, and said the company "further appears to be potentially supporting Russia’s ongoing invasion of Ukraine."翻译:立法者询问 Autel 是否应该面临类似的限制，理由是担心 Autel 技术在新疆使用，并表示该公司“似乎还可能支持俄罗斯持续入侵乌克兰”。

Gallagher and Krishnamoorthi earlier this month introduced legislation seeking to ban the U.S. government from buying any Chinese drones.翻译:加拉格尔和克里希纳莫提本月早些时候提出了立法，试图禁止美国政府购买任何中国无人机。

Congress in 2019 banned the Pentagon from buying or using drones and components manufactured in China.翻译:国会于2019年禁止五角大楼购买或使用中国制造的无人机及零部件。

The U.S. government has taken other actions to limit Chinese-made drone purchases.翻译:美国政府还采取了其他行动来限制购买中国制造的无人机。

The U.S. Interior Department in January 2020 said it was grounding its fleet of about 800 Chinese-made drones after halting additional purchases of such drones by the agency.翻译:美国内政部于 2020 年 1 月表示，在停止额外采购此类无人机后，将停飞由约 800 架中国制造的无人机组成的机队。

Over 50% of drones sold in the United States are made by DJI, and they are the most popular drones in use by public safety agencies, Republican lawmakers said earlier this year.翻译:共和党议员今年早些时候表示，美国销售的无人机中有超过 50% 由大疆创新制造，它们是公共安全机构最受欢迎的无人机。

Reporting by David Shepardson; Editing by Chris Reese and Mark Porter翻译:大卫·谢泼德森报道；克里斯·里斯和马克·波特编辑

item.title: 中国中金公司分析师被告知不要发表悲观观点，穿奢侈品——备忘录
item.description:
China International Capital Corp (CICC) (3908.HK), the country's third-largest investment bank by market value, has told analysts not to publish bearish views on China's economy or its financial markets, according to an internal memo seen by Reuters.翻译:据路透社看到的一份内部备忘录，中国市值第三大投资银行中国国际金融公司（中金公司） （3908.HK）已告知分析师不要发表对中国经济或金融市场的悲观观点。

The memo, which was sent to the bank's research department, also told them to refrain from commenting on issues that are not in line with government policies.翻译:这份发送给该银行研究部门的备忘录还告诉他们不要对不符合政府政策的问题发表评论。

Additionally, staff at the state-owned investment bank have been asked to not wear luxury brands or disclose their pay. Employees should "make sure their family members adhere to social and ethical standards", the memo said.翻译:此外，这家国有投资银行的员工被要求不得穿着奢侈品牌或透露自己的薪酬。备忘录称，员工应“确保其家庭成员遵守社会和道德标准”。

CICC did not respond to Reuters' request for comments.翻译:中金公司没有回应路透社的置评请求。

Bloomberg first reported the memo on Thursday.翻译:彭博社周四首先报道了这份备忘录。

CICC, the most active Chinese investment bank in offshore dealmaking, also said in the memo that extra caution should be applied when dealing with overseas clients to avoid political and national security risks.翻译:离岸交易最活跃的中资投行中金公司也在备忘录中表示，在与海外客户打交道时应格外谨慎，以避免政治和国家安全风险。

While negative comments by market analysts and commentators in China have often been censored by authorities, the trend became more noticeable after China's economic growth began to weaken last year.翻译:尽管中国市场分析师和评论员的负面评论经常受到当局的审查， 但这种趋势在去年中国经济增长开始疲软后变得更加明显。

The central government has also widened crackdowns on corruption and used rhetoric that criticises the country's "financial elite" for leading "hedonistic" lifestyles - part of its "common prosperity" drive that began in 2021.翻译:中央政府还加大了对腐败的打击力度，并使用言论批评该国“金融精英”过着“享乐主义”的生活方式——这是2021年开始的“共同富裕”行动的一部分。

Chinese banks began giving verbal guidance as early as 2022, warning bankers to stop posting photos that depicted lavish lifestyles on social media.翻译:中国的银行早在2022年就开始发出口头指导，警告银行家停止在社交媒体上发布描绘奢华生活方式的照片。

Banks have also been forced to cut pay and perks for investment bankers, including compensation and budget reductions for travel and entertainment.翻译:银行还被迫削减投资银行家的薪酬和福利，包括旅行和娱乐方面的薪酬和预算削减。

Reuters reported in April that CICC slashed bankers' bonuses by as much as 40%.翻译:路透社4月份报道称，中金公司将银行家的奖金削减了40%之多。

Reporting by Selena Li and Jason Xue; Editing by Sumeet Chatterjee and Edwina Gibbs翻译:赛琳娜·李和杰森·薛的报道；苏米特·查特吉和埃德温娜·吉布斯编辑
item.author: Reuters

item.title: 独家：中国恒大寻求通过最后一搏债务计划避免清算
item.description:
China Evergrande Group (3333.HK), the world's most indebted property developer, is seeking to avert a potentially imminent liquidation with a last-minute debt restructuring proposal, three people with direct knowledge of the matter said.翻译:三名直接了解情况的人士表示，全球负债最重的房地产开发商中国恒大集团（3333.HK）正在寻求通过最后一刻的债务重组方案来避免可能迫在眉睫的清算。

The defaulted company has until a Hong Kong court hearing on Monday to present a "concrete" revised debt restructuring proposal for offshore creditors, a judge said last month after its original plan had lapsed.翻译:上个月，在原计划失效后，一名法官表示，这家违约公司必须在周一香港法庭听证会之前向离岸债权人提交一份“具体的”修订后的债务重组方案。

But the sources, who declined to be named as the talks are private, told Reuters that creditors were unlikely to accept Evergrande's new proposal given low recovery prospects and growing concerns about the developer's future.翻译:但由于谈判是私下进行而不愿透露姓名的消息人士告诉路透社，鉴于复苏前景黯淡以及对开发商未来的担忧日益加剧，债权人不太可能接受恒大的新提议。

With more than $300 billion in liabilities, Evergrande exemplifies a crisis in China's property sector, which makes up one-quarter of the world's second-biggest economy. The authorities have scrambled to support the sector as the troubles of embattled developers roiled global markets.翻译:恒大集团的负债超过3000亿美元，是中国房地产业危机的典型例子，而中国房地产业占世界第二大经济体的四分之一。由于陷入困境的开发商的麻烦扰乱了全球市场，当局已争先恐后地支持该行业。

Guangzhou-based Evergrande, which defaulted on its offshore debt in late 2021, did not respond to a request for comment.翻译:总部位于广州的恒大集团于 2021 年底出现离岸债务违约，该公司没有回应置评请求。

Ahead of the hearing when the Hong Kong High Court will rule on a liquidation petition, Evergrande this week offered to swap some debt held by offshore creditors into equity in the company and two Hong Kong-listed units, and repay the rest with non-tradeable "certificates" backed by offshore assets, two sources said.翻译:在香港高等法院就清算申请作出裁决之前，恒大集团本周提出将境外债权人持有的部分债务转换为该公司和两家香港上市公司的股权，并以非流通股偿还剩余部分。两位消息人士称，这些“证书”由离岸资产支持。

The offshore assets include the developer's minority stakes in other companies and its receivables, one of the two sources said, and the certificates would be redeemed by Evergrande when it successfully disposes of the assets. The plan is not expected to require regulatory approval, as Chinese regulators have banned the developer from issuing new bonds, he added.翻译:两位消息人士之一表示，离岸资产包括开发商在其他公司的少数股权及其应收账款，恒大成功处置这些资产后将赎回这些凭证。他补充说，该计划预计不需要监管部门批准，因为中国监管机构已禁止开发商发行新债券。

The new proposal also offers creditors a 17.8% stake in Evergrande, in addition to an October offer, previously reported by Reuters, of 30% stakes in each of its two Hong Kong units - Evergrande Property Services Group (6666.HK) and Evergrande New Energy Vehicle Group (0708.HK) - the person said.翻译:新提案还向债权人提出了恒大17.8%的股份，此外，据路透社此前报道，债权人在10月份提出了恒大物业服务集团（6666.HK）和恒大新城两个香港子公司各30%的股份。新能源汽车集团（0708.HK） ——上述人士表示。

Many creditors were dissatisfied with the October terms as they implied a major haircut on investments, sources have said, forcing Evergrande to scramble to sweeten the deal in what could be its final attempt to avoid liquidation.

LIQUIDATION CHALLENGES

The spectre of a messy collapse of Evergrande has been a major concern for global investors as the Chinese economy sputters, with property sales slowing and hundreds of thousands of unfinished homes across the country.翻译:随着中国经济陷入困境，房地产销售放缓，全国各地有数十万套未完工房屋，恒大集团混乱倒闭的担忧一直是全球投资者的主要担忧。

Chinese authorities have announced a string of measures to revive the sector destabilised by the debt woes of giants like Evergrande and Country Garden (2007.HK).翻译:中国当局宣布了一系列措施，以重振因恒大和碧桂园（2007.HK）等巨头的债务危机而不稳定的行业。

Evergrande's debt revamp hopes were derailed in late September when the company said billionaire founder Hui Ka Yan was under investigation for unspecified "illegal crimes".翻译:恒大集团的债务重组希望在9月下旬落空，当时该公司表示亿万富翁创始人许家印因未具体说明的“非法犯罪”正在接受调查。

The developer was banned from issuing dollar bonds, a key part of the restructuring plan, and its flagship mainland unit was put under investigation by regulators.翻译:该开发商被禁止发行美元债券，这是重组计划的关键部分，其大陆旗舰子公司也受到监管机构的调查。

If the Hong Kong court orders Evergrande's liquidation, a provisional liquidator and then an official liquidator would be appointed to take control and arrange to sell the company's assets to repay its debts.翻译:如果香港法院下令恒大清算，将任命一名临时清算人，然后任命一名正式清算人来接管公司并安排出售公司资产以偿还债务。

In addition to shares of its two Hong Kong-listed units, this would include selling its onshore assets, which could face significant challenges, restructuring experts say.翻译:重组专家表示，除了出售其在香港上市的两家子公司的股票外，这还包括出售其境内资产，这可能面临重大挑战。

A lawyer for an ad hoc group of key offshore bondholders told the Hong Kong court last month that the restructuring plan could have a higher recovery rate for creditors than liquidation, in which they would get back less than 3%.翻译:一个由主要离岸债券持有人组成的特别小组的律师上个月向香港法院表示，重组计划对债权人的回收率可能高于清算，而清算时债权人的回收率将低于 3%。

Still, the group has nominated consultancy Alvarez & Marsal as its preferred liquidator, two other sources said, as creditors anticipate a potential liquidation of Evergrande, whose liabilities and assets are largely in mainland China.翻译:另外两名消息人士称，尽管如此，该集团仍提名咨询公司 Alvarez & Marsal 作为其首选清算人，因为债权人预计恒大可能会被清算，而恒大的负债和资产主要位于中国大陆。

Alvarez & Marsal did not immediately respond to request for comment.翻译:Alvarez & Marsal 没有立即回应置评请求。

Top Shine, an investor in Evergrande unit Fangchebao, filed the liquidation petition in June 2022 after it said the developer failed to honour an agreement to repurchase shares the investor had bought in the subsidiary.翻译:恒大旗下房车宝的投资者Top Shine于2022年6月提交了清算申请，此前该公司称该开发商未能履行回购其投资者所购买的子公司股份的协议。
